header.title: Frontend Study Dashboard
header.description: Select a week to view the curriculum and interactive examples.

week1.title: JS Deep Dive
week1.description: Event Loop, `this`, Closures, and Async patterns.

week4.title: State Management
week4.description: Deep Dive into Redux, Middleware, Modern Libraries (MobX/Recoil/Zustand), and more.

week5.title: React & Next.js Advanced
week5.description: Concurrency, React 19, App Router, and Data Strategies.

week7.title: Forms & Validation
week7.description: React Hook Form, Zod, async validation, security, and UX.

week8.title: Frontend Testing
week8.description: Unit, Integration, and E2E testing with Jest, Vitest, RTL, MSW.

week9.title: Framer Motion
week9.description: Gestures, drag, layout animations, transitions, and performance.

week10.title: GSAP Animation
week10.description: GSAP basics, ScrollTrigger, SVG animations, and performance.

week11.title: Web Performance
week11.description: Core Web Vitals, LCP, INP, CLS, and optimization strategies.

week12.title: Auth & Security
week12.description: OAuth 2.0, OIDC, NextAuth.js, JWT, XSS, CSRF protection.

week13.title: Workers & PWA
week13.description: Web Workers, Service Workers, PWA, IndexedDB, offline-first.

week14.title: Accessibility & i18n
week14.description: WCAG, Semantic HTML, ARIA, Focus Management, i18n, RTL support.

week15.title: DevTools & Bundling
week15.description: Chrome DevTools, Webpack/Vite, Bundle Optimization, Sentry, Web Vitals.

week16.title: TypeScript
week16.description: Master basics to generics, utility types, and conditional types.

week17.title: AI-Powered Dev Tools
week17.description: AI code agents, MCP, Skills, Hooks for workflow automation.

week18.title: WebAssembly
week18.description: Near-native performance, Rust development, SIMD, image/video processing.

week19.title: React Three Fiber
week19.description: 3D scenes, rendering pipeline, interaction, and performance optimization.

week20.title: MFE & Monorepo
week20.description: Micro frontend architecture and monorepo tooling strategy.

week21.title: CI/CD & DevOps
week21.description: Build delivery pipelines, automate releases, and set operational guardrails.

week22.title: Error Tracking & Production Monitoring
week22.description: Build production observability with Sentry, Session Replay, RUM, and GA4.
